segments.text: Amy , you don't look so well . What happened ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I feel terrible . I have been coughing for the whole morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I feel chilly and sluggish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you had similar feelings before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . This is my first Ae abroad . I am not sure what is wrong with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry . I believe you are just not agreeing with the local climate . I will get you some medicine . You will be alright after a good rest .
segments.speaker: S1
